docs.title: Kano Agent Backlog Skill API
docs.text: Complete Python API reference for the Kano Agent Backlog Skill.

docs.title: Quick Start
docs.text:
from kano_backlog_skill import BacklogManager

# Initialize backlog manager
manager = BacklogManager(product="my-product")

# Create a new task
task = manager.create_task(
    title="Implement user authentication",
    description="Add login/logout functionality"
)

# Update task status
task.transition_to("InProgress")

docs.title: Core Modules
docs.text:
• Core - Main backlog management classes
  • CLI - Command-line interface
  • Models - Data models and schemas
  • Services - Business logic services

docs.title: Navigation
docs.text: Use the navigation menu to explore the complete API reference.

docs.title: Main Commands
docs.text:
• kano-backlog item - Work item operations
  • kano-backlog workset - Workset cache operations
  • kano-backlog topic - Topic context operations
  • kano-backlog view - Dashboard and reporting

docs.title: WorkItem Classes
docs.text:
• Epic - Large initiative
  • Feature - Cohesive capability
  • UserStory - User-facing functionality
  • Task - Technical work item
  • Bug - Defect to be fixed

docs.title: Models Module
docs.text: Data models and schemas for backlog items.

docs.title: Core Models
docs.text:
• WorkItemModel - Base model for all work items
  • WorklogEntry - Individual worklog entries
  • WorksetModel - Execution context model
  • TopicModel - Context grouping model

docs.title: Core Services
docs.text:
• BacklogService - Main business logic
  • WorksetService - Workset management
  • TopicService - Topic operations
  • ViewService - Dashboard generation
